title: Profanity Filter Not Turning Off
body:
My profanity filter is always on. It won't turn off. It's not checked on, and I've already tried to do the language filter change in:

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases(lat est version)\deploy\preferences

I'm still on the old client, not the new one. Can anyone help me disable it?

replies.body: Can you swap over to the New Client and see if this persists there? Some players have reported this can be resolved by swapping over to the other client, which can sometimes resolve the issue on your original client.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=q65sj34F,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-10T05:31:52.164+0000)
>
> Can you swap over to the New Client and see if this persists there? Some players have reported this can be resolved by swapping over to the other client, which can sometimes resolve the issue on your original client.

For me, swapping to the new client was what forced my profanity filter to turn on. It turns off in chat outside of games, but not inside.

Since you're still having issues, I'd recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) If you grab some logs with our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), it will greatly assist in providing us with materials to continue troubleshooting this.

Let me know if you run into any issues submitting your ticket. :)
If your getting **** type /chatfilter in the chat and hit enter. It will say “Profanity Filter Enabled” but it disables it. Proceed to type your favorite curse and it should not censor.
